verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Every praise is to our God
Every word of worship with one accord
Every praise, every praise is to our God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God my Savior
God my Healer
God my Deliverer
Yes He is, yes He is

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Every praise is to our God
Every word of worship with one accord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Every praise, every praise
Is to our God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing hallelujah to our God
Glory hallelujah is due our God
Every praise, every praise is to our God
